contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox musical artist <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject Musicians --> | name = Nic Endo | image = Nic Endo (Alec Empire band).jpg | caption = | image_size = <!-- Only for images narrower than 220 pixels --> | background = solo_singer | birth_name = | alias = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1976|1|7|mf=y}} | death_date = | origin = [[United States]] | instrument = | genre = [[Digital hardcore]], [[Noise music|noise]], [[breakcore]], [[hardcore techno]] | occupation = | years_active = | label = | associated_acts = [[Atari Teenage Riot]], [[Alec Empire]] | website = | current_members = | past_members = | notable_instruments = }} '''Nic Endo''' (born January 7, 1976) is a [[Japan]]ese-[[Germany|German]]-[[United States|American]] [[noise music]]ian who plays with the German [[digital hardcore]] group [[Atari Teenage Riot]]. The daughter of a Japanese mother and a German father, Endo was born in [[Wichita Falls]], [[Texas]], [[United States|US]]. ==Background== Endo lived in [[Frankfurt]] from 1994 to 1996 and later moved to [[Berlin]]. Nic Endo joined ATR while they were on tour in 1997 and was involved with the production of their final album ''[[60 Second Wipe Out]]''. After ATR effectively broke-up in 2000, Endo released an experimental solo album entitled ''[[Cold Metal Perfection]]''. Released by [[Fatal Recordings]], an explicitly [[feminist]] offshoot of [[Digital Hardcore Recordings]], ''Cold Metal Perfection'' was named as one of the top 20 albums of 2001 by ''[[Alternative Press (music magazine)|Alternative Press]]''. In 2001, Endo assisted in the production of [[Alec Empire]]'s solo album, ''[[Intelligence and Sacrifice]]''. She has also since been a part of Empire's touring band, and was also involved with his follow-up album ''Futurist'' (2005). In 2010 ATR reformed and Endo has taken Hanin Elias's slot as the female vocalist in ATR. Her trademark is her black leather and white face paint overlaid by the characters 抵抗, meaning "resistance". == Influences == Endo has spoken about her appreciation for [[Alice Coltrane]], [[James Chance]], [[Miles Davis]], [[Jimi Hendrix]], [[Destroy All Monsters (band)|Destroy All Monsters]], [[Freddie Hubbard]], [[Led Zeppelin]], [[Maya Deren]], [[John Coltrane]], [[Brainticket]], [[the Velvet Underground]], [[the Doors]], [[Neu!]], and [[Sun Ra]].<ref>[http://www.myspace.com/nicendowhiteheat Myspace Page, Access date: June 19, 2008]</ref> ==Discography== * ''[[White Heat (EP)|White Heat]]'' (DHR 1998) * ''[[Poison Lips]]'' (as She Satellites) (Geist 1998) * ''[[Cold Metal Perfection]]'' (DHR Fatal 2001) ==External links== *[http://www.digitalhardcore.com/artist_bio.asp?Artist_ID=3 Nic Endo biography] at [http://www.digitalhardcore.com DigitalHardcore.com] *{{myspace|nicendowhiteheat}} == References == {{reflist}} <br /> {{Atari Teenage Riot}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Endo, Nic | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH =January 7, 1976 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Endo, Nic}} [[Category:1976 births]] [[Category:American electronic musicians]] [[Category:German industrial musicians]] [[Category:People from Wichita Falls, Texas]] [[Category:Musicians from Berlin]] [[Category:People from Frankfurt]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American industrial musicians]] [[Category:American musicians of Japanese descent]] [[Category:American people of German descent]] [[Category:German people of Japanese descent]] [[Category:German electronic musicians]] {{US-musician-stub}}
